data.message: Facebook, where do I go if I have security questions that I want to ask a actual person? I didn't find my answers at the help center, and I don't see a customer service contact. :(

replies.message: Hey Jennifer. This is a great place to ask a question. Let us know how we can help. -Nancy
Facebook Please help me from Facebook to solve my problem I want to document my page on Facebook I've put all the correct information about me please you to help me solve my problem
I just had problems with a stranger messaging me. I blocked them but I had few other questions that I didn't really want to post publicly.
Haven't been able to get a response from anywhere else though. Thanks Nancy.
